name: Impossible Driving Test Simulator 3D
description:
Impossible driving drives you crazy with a brand new look in a PRO version. NO ADS! 100% COMPLETE GAME!

Burn up sky high ramps with impossible car driving game of 2k17. Buckle up for stunt driving and muscle car racing on deadly tracks. Be a furious driver of luxury cars, sports bikes and bmx bicycles on sky high impossible roads.

Welcome to impossible car driving game where your ultimate goal is to drive vigilantly on sky high narrow tracks. Extreme car driving challenge begins with an extra dose of amazing sports bike and GT racing. Drive your dream vehicle like lamborghini, prado cars, buggy car, sports bike and bmx bicycle. Launch yourself upon risky roads, control as you hit the loud pedal and roll into impossible tracks racing culture. Feel like driving for your life on crazy heights to accomplish impossible missions. Hold motorcycle controls to perform killer stunts over sky high ramps. Never back down as you drive insanely on impossible paths, jump from huge ramps on gapped tracks and increase your rep. Drift, drag and roll your ride to win on your tail, hitting each inch of the map hard by your driving skills. Be a furious driver, own the sky high ramps and score to take ride on world’s most dangerous tracks. Because one ride is never enough!

Key Features:
30 challenging missions to complete on impossible roads
Multiple vehicles: prado cars, stunt bikes, bmx cycle
Mid-air stunts and sky driving tracks adventures
Luxury car stunts and realistic driving simulation
Amazing tracks, sharp turns & deadly obstacles
High quality 3D graphics and eye catching animations
Amazing sounds and smooth controls

Enjoy the unique gameplay and give your feedback to help us improve this game in future releases.
